entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023
